title: GetBestAction Request
description: Get the best action calculated by the specified player

gameID.description: The ID of the game to which the state belongs

stateID.description: The ID of the state to which the action generator belongs

playerID.description: The ID of the player, from which the best action is got

maxThinkTime.description: The maximum time the player is allowed to think, in seconds. Only works for players with the ability to control think time. If not specified, return as soon as possible
